mapper.sql: SELECT HB_NO, MER_NO, CATE_NO, HB_TITLE, HB_SUMMARY, HB_STARTDATE, HB_FEE, HB_DISCOUNT_RATE, HB_DISCOUNT_STATUS, HB_ENDDATE, HB_IMGS_ORI, HB_IMGS_RENAME, HB_THUM_ORI, HB_THUM_RENAME, HB_INFO, HB_LOCATION FROM HOBBY WHERE STATUS = 'Y'

SELECT MER_NO, MER_ID, MER_PASSWORD, MER_EMAIL, MER_NAME, MER_PHONE, MER_DATE, BANK, MER_NICK, STATUS, MER_IMG_ORIGINAL, MER_IMG_RENAME, MER_IDCARD, CATE_NO , GREETING FROM MERCHANT WHERE STATUS = 'Y'
mapper.select: SELECT H.HB_NO, H.MER_NO, H.CATE_NO, C.CATE_NAME, H.HB_TITLE, H.HB_SUMMARY, H.HB_STARTDATE, H.HB_FEE, H.HB_DISCOUNT_RATE, H.HB_DISCOUNT_STATUS, H.HB_ENDDATE, H.HB_IMGS_ORI, H.HB_IMGS_RENAME, H.HB_THUM_ORI, H.HB_THUM_RENAME, H.HB_INFO, H.HB_LOCATION FROM HOBBY H JOIN CATEGORY C ON(H.CATE_NO = C.CATE_NO) WHERE H.STATUS = 'Y'

SELECT H.HB_NO, H.MER_NO, H.CATE_NO, C.CATE_NAME, H.HB_TITLE, H.HB_SUMMARY, H.HB_STARTDATE, H.HB_FEE, H.HB_DISCOUNT_RATE, H.HB_DISCOUNT_STATUS, H.HB_ENDDATE, H.HB_IMGS_ORI, H.HB_IMGS_RENAME, H.HB_THUM_ORI, H.HB_THUM_RENAME, H.HB_INFO, H.HB_LOCATION FROM HOBBY H JOIN CATEGORY C ON(H.CATE_NO = C.CATE_NO) WHERE H.HB_DISCOUNT_STATUS = 'Y' AND H.STATUS = 'Y' ORDER BY H.HB_DISCOUNT_RATE DESC

SELECT H.HB_NO, H.MER_NO, H.CATE_NO, C.CATE_NAME, H.HB_TITLE, H.HB_SUMMARY, H.HB_STARTDATE, H.HB_FEE, H.HB_DISCOUNT_RATE, H.HB_DISCOUNT_STATUS, H.HB_ENDDATE, H.HB_IMGS_ORI, H.HB_IMGS_RENAME, H.HB_THUM_ORI, H.HB_THUM_RENAME, H.HB_INFO, H.HB_LOCATION FROM HOBBY H JOIN CATEGORY C ON(H.CATE_NO = C.CATE_NO) WHERE H.CATE_NO = 6 AND H.STATUS = 'Y'

SELECT H.HB_NO, H.MER_NO, H.CATE_NO, C.CATE_NAME, H.HB_TITLE, H.HB_SUMMARY, H.HB_STARTDATE, H.HB_FEE, H.HB_DISCOUNT_RATE, H.HB_DISCOUNT_STATUS, H.HB_ENDDATE, H.HB_IMGS_ORI, H.HB_IMGS_RENAME, H.HB_THUM_ORI, H.HB_THUM_RENAME, H.HB_INFO, H.HB_LOCATION FROM HOBBY H JOIN CATEGORY C ON(H.CATE_NO = C.CATE_NO) JOIN LIKED L ON(H.HB_NO = L.HB_NO) WHERE L.STATUS = 'Y' AND H.STATUS = 'Y'

SELECT H.HB_NO, H.MER_NO, H.CATE_NO, C.CATE_NAME, H.HB_TITLE, H.HB_SUMMARY, H.HB_STARTDATE, H.HB_FEE, H.HB_DISCOUNT_RATE, H.HB_DISCOUNT_STATUS, H.HB_ENDDATE, H.HB_IMGS_ORI, H.HB_IMGS_RENAME, H.HB_THUM_ORI, H.HB_THUM_RENAME, H.HB_INFO, H.HB_LOCATION, TO_DATE(TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYYMMDD')) - TO_DATE(HB_STARTDATE) FROM HOBBY H JOIN CATEGORY C ON(H.CATE_NO = C.CATE_NO) WHERE TO_DATE(TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYYMMDD')) - TO_DATE(HB_STARTDATE) < 0 AND H.STATUS = 'Y'

SELECT DISTINCT H.HB_NO, H.MER_NO, H.CATE_NO, C.CATE_NAME, H.HB_TITLE, H.HB_SUMMARY, H.HB_STARTDATE, H.HB_FEE, H.HB_DISCOUNT_RATE, H.HB_DISCOUNT_STATUS, H.HB_ENDDATE, H.HB_IMGS_ORI, H.HB_IMGS_RENAME, H.HB_THUM_ORI, H.HB_THUM_RENAME, H.HB_INFO, H.HB_LOCATION FROM HOBBY H JOIN CATEGORY C ON(H.CATE_NO = C.CATE_NO) JOIN RESERVE R ON(H.HB_NO = R.HB_NO) WHERE (H.HB_NO) IN ( SELECT HB_NO FROM (SELECT DISTINCT HB_NO, COUNT(*)OVER(PARTITION BY HB_NO)AS 예약횟수 FROM RESERVE ORDER BY 예약횟수 DESC) WHERE ROWNUM <= 20) AND H.STATUS = 'Y' AND R.RES_STATUS = 'Y'
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM HOBBY WHERE STATUS='Y'
